entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Local blowing snow near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 14 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 3.
